availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Enoch Vice Brother (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Married to Emily Barnes Brother on October 2, 1855 in Bath County, Kentucky. Clerk in Bath County, Kentucky in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Division 2, p. 1B.
Find A Grave, "Enoch Vice Brother (Apr. 8, 1830-Mar. 29, 1895)," Memorial # 116122425, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/116122425 (accessed March 30, 2020).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film #000273007, p.
